constraints.name: cost_constraint
constraints.description: 选取的矩形的成本不超过给定的上限 c

constraints.name: segment_cost_definition
constraints.description: 矩形边的成本定义为边长与所在线段权重的乘积

constraints.name: rectangle_edge_constraint
constraints.description: 矩形的四条边必须在给定的垂直线和水平线上

constraints.name: ordering_constraint
constraints.description: 垂直线和水平线的坐标是严格递增的
